snippet: The price was down from the range of $23 to $25 that Carlyle had previously disclosed, indicating some potential weakness in investor appetite.
abstract: The price was down from the range of $23 to $25 that Carlyle had previously disclosed, indicating some potential weakness in investor appetite.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Carlyle Prices I.P.O. at $22, Below Expected Level
headline.print_headline: Carlyle’s I.P.O. Is Priced at $22, Below Expected Level
